summary: The 2024 College Football Playoff National Championship was held on January 8, 2024, in Houston, Texas. The Michigan Wolverines (Big Ten) and Washington Huskies (Pac-12) faced off. Michigan, led by Donovan Edwards and Blake Corum, won 34-13, securing their first national title since 1997. This was the last championship under the four-team format before the playoff expands to twelve teams. Washington will join the Big Ten Conference in 2024.
title: 2024 College Football Playoff National Championship
